headline: BMO Backs Boston Properties’ (BXP) Premium Strategy with Raised Price Target
summary: Boston Properties Inc. (NYSE:BXP) is one of Goldman Sachs’ top REIT stock picks. On June 23, BMO Capital reiterated its Outperform rating for BXP, a $12.7 billion office REIT, and raised its price target to $86. The firm pointed to the company’s strategic portfolio shift toward upscale developments and selective asset sales, while trimming its […]
